channel.title: Logging in Problem
channel.description: Well I don't know why, but when there's like 20+ people in my server. It's harder to get into the server.. I know people keep clicking "login" and even auto click it. And they still don't get in.. Even I tryed on the computer I host on, and It takes a while to get in. Now if I restart my server, then try after I restarted it, I can get in.. Anyone know what could be causing this problem?

item.title: Logging in Problem
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

The Player[] array in PlayerHandler is fill, and no empty memory slots can be found to allocate that connection to.

Read full topic

item.title: Logging in Problem
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

idk but maybe ur runserver is having a difficult time saving games and all that…

Read full topic

item.title: Logging in Problem
item.dc:creator: @Kingskrown Kingskrown
item.description:
@Kingskrown wrote:

Maybe your RAM is being maxed and when you reset it removes the process so less RAM is being used, therefore you can login?

Read full topic

How many peeps can your server hold?

in my server. It’s harder to get into the server… I know
people keep clicking “login” and even auto click it. And they still don’t

Now if I restart my server, then try after I restarted it, I can get in…
Anyone know what could be causing this problem?
